Author: x24throwaway
Text: I had cosmetic surgery last year. I’d wanted it for years, partly stemming from trauma and partly body image. I did talk to my therapist about it beforehand as I thought I probably should in case I was lacking insight. I am satisfied with the outcome. It was challenging though as I made myself eat more for the first 2 weeks post-op to help with healing as I was terrified of complications.

Author: catsinsunglassess
Text: I don’t really have any advice or anything but i also want a nose job and the thing I’m most concerned about is needing to eat more calories before surgery and during recovery in order to lessen the chances of complication and quicker healing.
